synergies.description: Navigate to find a hidden path, then traverse the difficult terrain.

narratives.fullSuccess: You discover a hidden path and traverse it successfully.
narratives.partialSuccess: You find the hidden path but cannot navigate the terrain.
narratives.primaryFailure: You search thoroughly but find no hidden passages.
narratives.primaryFumble: You become hopelessly lost searching for a hidden path.

synergies.description: Track prey to its lair, then bypass the entrance security.

narratives.fullSuccess: You follow the trail to the lair and slip inside undetected.
narratives.partialSuccess: You find the lair but cannot bypass its entrance.
narratives.primaryFailure: The trail goes cold. You'll need to find it again.
narratives.primaryFumble: The trail leads you into a dead endâ€”you've been misled.

synergies.description: Detect an approaching patrol, then use stealth to evade them.

narratives.fullSuccess: You spot the patrol and slip into the shadows, evading them.
narratives.partialSuccess: You spot the patrol but they catch a glimpse of you.
narratives.primaryFailure: You don't notice the patrol until it's too late.
narratives.primaryFumble: You walk directly into the patrol's path!

synergies.description: Discover a locked cache while foraging, then bypass the lock.

narratives.fullSuccess: You discover a locked cache and deftly bypass its mechanism.
narratives.partialSuccess: You find a cache but cannot bypass its lock.
narratives.primaryFailure: You find nothing of particular value.

find-hidden-path.description: Base navigation DC +1 for hidden path discovery

track-to-lair.description: Standard tracking DC based on trail age

avoid-patrol.description: DC to detect ambush sites and patrols

find-and-loot.description: DC to discover hidden caches (high difficulty)
